overview: Kim Kuzin was a very famous person in the USSR. He was born as the 4-billionth baby in 1974 and, from his very birth, he became the symbol of all the children of the USSR. In this fictional mockumentary, we will attempt to find Kim Kuzin today and to make a historical interview with him.

production_companies.name: Kyiv National I. K. Karpenko-Karyi Theatre, Cinema and Television University

title: Who Framed Kim Kuzin?
